question: Which football team has won the 2019 Durand Cup tournament?
explanation: In football, Gokulam Kerala FC won the 129th Durand Cup tournament by defeating heavyweights Mohun Bagan 2-1 at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata on 25th August 2019. It was a close game throughout which saw both the teams go through testing moments.  With this win, Gokulam Kerala became the first club from the state in 22 years to clinch the tournament.
